1.name: Crabbe & Goyle
1.ability: Each time a Dark Arts event or Villain causes a Hero to discard a card, that Hero loses 1 ❤️.

1.name: Draco Malfoy™
1.ability: Each time 🛑 is added to the Location, active Hero loses 2 ❤️.

2.name: Lucius Malfoy
2.ability: Each time 🛑 is added to the Location, remove 1 ⚡ from all Villains.
2.reward:
ALL Heroes gain 1 🪙.

2.name: Tom Riddle™
2.ability:
For each Ally in hand active Hero choses one:
Lose 2 ❤️; or discard a card.
2.reward:
ALL Heroes choose one:
Gain 2 ❤️; or search their discard pile for an Ally and put it in their hand.

2.name: Basilisk
2.ability:
Heroes cannot draw extra cards.
(You still draw 5 new cards at the end of your turn.)
2.reward:
ALL Heroes draw a card.
Remove 1 🛑 from the Location.

Remove 1 🛑 from the Location.

4.reward:

Voldemort5.name: Lord Voldemort™
Voldemort5.ability:
Active Hero loses 1 ❤️ and discards a card.
May not be assigned ⚡ until all other Villains are defeated.

Voldemort6.name: Lord Voldemort™
Voldemort6.ability:
Roll the 🟩 Die:
⚡ = ALL Heroes lose 1 ❤️.
🪙 = Add 1 🛑 to the Location.
❤️ = Remove 1 ⚡ from all Villains.
🔲 = ALL Heroes discard a card.
May not be assigned ⚡ until all other Villains are defeated.

Voldemort7.name: Lord Voldemort™
Voldemort7.ability:
Add 1 🛑 to the Location.
Each time 🛑 is removed from the Location, ALL Heroes lose 1 ❤️.
May not be assigned ⚡ until all other Villains are defeated.
